page.title: 01Belton Humberside
page.content: Belton is a large, rural village with a population of approximately 2,100 surrounded by flat agricultural land. Junction 2 of the recently completed M180 motorway lies one mile north of the village and affords easy and speedy access to the neighbouring towns of Doncaster and Scunthorpe and to the national motorway network. The majority of the villages working adults commute to work, though farms, a brickworks tile factory and three light industrial units do provide some local employment. Belton is a selected settlement for development in the latest Humberside Structure Plan. Recent building work has included a new primary school, housing and grouped dwellings and further expansion in housing is envisaged for the near future.
